Columns.Description: Type of agent the data was collected from.
Columns.Name: SourceSystem

Columns.Description: Type of the monitor. Ex;- node or cluster
Columns.Name: MonitorTypeId

Columns.Description: Instance ID of the monitor generating the health state
Columns.Name: MonitorInstanceId

Columns.Description: ID of the kubernetes cluster from which the event was sourced
Columns.Name: ClusterId

Columns.Description: Date and time the record was created.
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: Time the state change first was observed for this monitor
Columns.Name: TimeFirstObserved

Columns.Description: Monitor Labels. This may be a combination of kubernetes labels and azure monitor specific labels
Columns.Name: MonitorLabels

Columns.Description: Monitor configuration. This will be empty for aggregate monitors. Populated for Unit Monitors
Columns.Name: MonitorConfig

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _ResourceId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the subscription that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _SubscriptionId
